parameters.name: Msgs
parameters.description: Array of errors as defined by swCreateFeatureError_e

title: IFeatureManager.GetCreateFeatureErrors
description: Gets the errors that occurred during the last call to IFeatureManager::CreateFeature.
signature:
System.Int32 GetCreateFeatureErrors( 
   out System.Object
Msgs
,
   out System.String
FeatureTypeName
)

parameters.name: Msgs
parameters.description: Array of errors as defined by swCreateFeatureError_e

returns: 0 <= Number of messages issued at the time of last call to IFeatureManager::CreateFeature <= 20
remarks:
This method is valid only after attempting to create
Mate Controller
features using IFeatureManager::CreateFeature.
